column5: Taxes included! Newly remodeled and super clean, yet retains the historical charm of the San Jacinto district. This 2 Bedroom, 1 bath, home is located two blocks from the seawall in two directions! My place is close to art and culture, restaurants and dining, the beach, and family-friendly activities.
